website_summaries.verdict: It's an affordable, popular cleanser that's versatile for numerous types of skin.
pros: A rich cleanser that is ideal for all skin types thanks to its dermatologist-approved formula that cleans without irritating
Also a good deal, considering you get 2 bottles
cons: Rare reports of skin feeling dry after use, but many more happy customers who swear by its gentle cleansing action

customer_reviews.title: I bought this product for my wife for facial cleaning ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my wife for facial cleaning because it says facial cleanser on the label. When I received it, I could sense the strong odor of artificial fragrance which makes the user very uncomfortable. Return this product immediately and buy the Cetaphil Gentle Skin Cleanser instead for facial cleaning which is smell free.
customer_reviews.author: Zhongda Xu

customer_reviews.title: I never post reviews, but am doing so now ...
customer_reviews.text: I never post reviews, but am doing so now to warn all my fellow Cetaphil lovers that this product is 100% FAKE. DO NOT PURCHASE.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Fake?
customer_reviews.text: Don't know if this is fake but it smells horrible.....Not like the one I purchased from target.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: I recommend the second
customer_reviews.text: The Daily Facial Cleanser has a strong scent, stings my eyes, lightly foams, and leaves my skin feeling tight. The Gentle Facial Cleanser has fewer ingredients, no scent, doesn't sting my eyes, doesn't foam, doesn't leave my skin feeling tight, and can be wiped off with a towel. I recommend the Gentle Facial Cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: Joob

customer_reviews.title: My skin is so soft!
customer_reviews.text: Just like a lot of people here, I was intending to order a different product. This is a facial cleanser only and not the +body wash one. Still, I'm definitely not returning and will probably switch permanently to this one! My skin has never been softer! I'm prone to breakouts and had just run out of my usual acne treatments so I was expecting to break out while waiting for my replacement even with the facial wash, but I'm doing just as well, if not better, with this wash instead! I've only had it for about two weeks so it isn't THAT impressive that my skin's remained clear, but I'm very happy with what I got!
customer_reviews.author: Ophelia

customer_reviews.title: FAKE FAKE FAKE FAKE FAKE FAKE
customer_reviews.text: I have used Cetaphil for many many years because I've always had sensitive skin since a child. And it wasn't until quarantine that I decided to purchase from Amazon and what a HUGE MISTAKE! This broke out and irritated my skin terribly. Has my face red and stinging. Even the small amount that fell to my chest burnt it. Whatever it is, it's super strong. Never ever have I had this problem with any Cetaphil products. Went to Walgreens today and got the real and I could instantly tell. It's a shame all this fake crap being sold on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: ST Dallas

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and value. I have combination skin and this cleanser seems to be the only thing that works for my skin. It doesn’t strip the natural oils and make your face feel dry. I am in my mid 30’s so I have had a lot of trial and error with products expensive and inexpensive over time. Cetaphil is definitely the gentle cleanser that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Arisa

customer_reviews.title: Good product bad shipping
customer_reviews.text: I love the product too bad they couldn't come up with a better shipping method. A huge box for two small bottles and it leaked all over inside. Who knows how much product I lost during shipment from the leaking.
customer_reviews.author: Dee mac

customer_reviews.title: Not fake
customer_reviews.text: I think all the reviews that say it's fake are people who thought they were buying the gentle skin cleanser and not the daily facial cleanser. None the less still a great deal and works well with my sensitive skin. Has a soapy smell but not very overpowering, just smells like face wash
customer_reviews.author: Reide

customer_reviews.title: NOT REAL STUFF. FAKE!
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered the two pack. First bottle was the real stuff, which was fine. When I opened the second bottle was garbage nock off. It was very fragrant clear cheap soap. It foamed up a lot. The real stuff does not foam like soap. NOT REAL STUFF. FAKE! So disappointed because the first bottle was good. I'm have very sensitive skin and skin becomes beet red if I use certain products. Do No Buy if you have sensitive skin. TERRIBLE! Its such a shame that there are scams like this on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: rosemary middlecamp

customer_reviews.title: FAKE
customer_reviews.text: Been using Cetaphil for 5 years--this is definitely a fake product. Original should be milky and watery, this one is clear and sticky with a chemical smell. Will return but save yourselves the trouble
customer_reviews.author: J. Y.

customer_reviews.title: I don't know what this is, but it is awful. DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.text: I've used the Cetaphil Gentle Skin Cleanser for years. I accidentally bought this, not realizing it said "Daily Skin Cleanser" instead of "Gentle" and this stuff is AWFUL. It's thick, reminded me of a shampoo rather than a skin cleanser, it doesn't lather at all, it SMELLS HORRIBLE, like a weird chemical smell that made me actually scared to use it. There is no way I will be using this on a daily basis. Unfortunately I had purchased a two pack, but it was before I was out of my previous bottle of Gentle Skin Cleanser and now I'm outside the return window. Waste of money. And a complete disappointment. DO NOT BUY THIS.
customer_reviews.author: kerryanndunn

customer_reviews.title: FAKE PRODUCT,  NO RETURNS
customer_reviews.text: FAKE PRODUCT, NO RETURNS Do NOT buy, even if it's "Amazon's Choice" It seems to be fragranced hand soap, at best. Again, NO Returns!!! Amazon should do better at preventing this kind of activity.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: The product I received has a very strong abnormal chemical odor.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product for couple of years, but the bottle i received from Amazon has a very strong abnormal chemical odor and causes headache. I have never had such bad experience using the same product for the last couple years. Today is the first time i purchased from amazon and it is unreturnable. Think before you buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonwinner

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS A FAKE PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: This is not Cetaphil; the bottle is filled with some kind of heavily fragranced hand soap. I opened a bottle after my current supply ran out. This was three months after purchase. I couldn't get my money back. Please don't make the same mistake!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Randolph

customer_reviews.title: Boom!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a supply of face soap for my old man skin at home and another one for the same patch of skin at the office. And I didn't need frippery. Just the barest whiff of a scent is about the most my purposes could applaud. Boom. The fact that Cetaphil comes in a double-pack and barely smells of anything was a great start. The boon was that it actually pulls off the promised job of cleaning up my face twice a day very well. And the price is not gilded with extras. Good value here.
customer_reviews.author: David A. BaerTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Product😁😊💕!!
customer_reviews.text: Using this for 10yrs and counting wonderful light weight product but definitely cleanses your skin. Never causes breakouts. I have EXTREMELY sensitive skin and won't use anything else (besides Dove bar soap😂.) High reccomend👍👍!!
customer_reviews.author: James Destra

customer_reviews.title: Not Cetaphil. Contained baby oil.
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT ORDER. Had this stored until I ran out of my current supply. Now I open to find baby oil in the container instead of soap.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: User for years, great product!
customer_reviews.text: Been using this stuff for years. Seems to be the only stuff that keeps me from breaking out. Has clean non overpowering scent and gives my face that fresh clean feel afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Choi

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this cleanser because I like their regular body&face lotion so much
customer_reviews.text: The fragrance of the cleanser is very strong. It also caused allergic reaction to my skin - itchiness acne and dryness. I ordered this cleanser because I like their regular body&face lotion so much...
customer_reviews.author: msk

customer_reviews.title: This is AUTHENTIC Cetaphil
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so I have been using this product for about 20 years and ordered the dual set (at a very low price) prior to seeing the latest reviews that say that this product is "fake." I was concerned. I opened the bottles and compared with the product I have on-hand (purchased at Target) and can tell you that this is AUTHENTIC Cetaphil. From the container to the consistency to the scent. The REAL DEAL. So...save some long-term money and buy the two-fer.
customer_reviews.author: SybilMacD

customer_reviews.title: I'm replacing my more expensive cleansers with this
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to find an alternative to "trendy" and EXPENSIVE facial or related cleansers, and decided on this. I'm using it for not just face (where it works extreamly well), but every other area where I would normally use a body wash or soap. I expecially like the fact that this does not contain soap or any type of fragrence !!! Of course I will still use soap for hand washing where concern about Covid-19 is concerned.
customer_reviews.author: Chris the  picky shopper

customer_reviews.title: Fragrance, fairly strong but fades.
customer_reviews.text: I just had a light chemical peel, 5 days ago, which I feel is a failure. The areas of my face that have brown sun damage that I wanted gone have not reacted at all, the rest of my face, right down the middle, has reacted a little and is peeling very lightly. I was told to use this daily facial cleanser. It stings. Not a lot, but it definitely stings. Since I am a compliant patient, I will continue with it but I think I need a stronger peel next time. Will report to my doctor and go from there. The cleanser is a clear liquid/gel, slightly thinner consistency than Dawn dish soap.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Not returnable/ smells horrible
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product by mistake (I wanted the regular genteel cleanser, instead I accidentally ordered the facial cleanser - they look remarkably similar). The product might be good if you can get past how it smells. I couldn't use it because it smells so bad.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Good facial cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I had been previously using CeraVe facial soap and I loved it but my skin changed over the winter and I felt like it was drying my face out. So I got this to give it a try. It has a clean smell but it works good. It is slightly thick so you know youre not getting a watered down product. My only complaint is I do have dry skin so if I shower and dont put moisturizer on soon after, my face feels all dry and cracky. But I do like how it cleans.
customer_reviews.author: DeRiah M.

customer_reviews.title: Counterfeit
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for years and I'm super familiar with the scent and consistency. This recent order is clearly counterfeit - the scent is very strong and quite odd and the soap is thicker overall. Shame on Amazon for selling fake products. I plan on buying locally from now on.
customer_reviews.author: White Lightning

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of the fragrance, but does it's job well and the price was good.
customer_reviews.text: I know they're different products but when I see packaging like cetaphil's, with simple non-sensational branding and information like "for sensitive skin" and the like, I think of Cera Ve and for that reason I'm always taken aback at the fairly strong fragrance. It doesn't say fragrance free, so it's my fault, but even as fragrances go, I'm not fond of the vaguely baby-powderish smell that lingers after my shower or face wash. It definitely does it's job well; I have pretty oily skin and this doesn't make my skin act up or dry up when I wash frequently which is perfect. Just wish it was fragrance free.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Brick

customer_reviews.title: Formulation is unique to this normal-oily product line — A Plus
customer_reviews.text: I assumed that this normal-oily product line was just a slight variation from the other more general normal Cetaphil skin product. Instead, this formulation is clear, viscous liquid versus the more whitish thinner normal variation and the ingredients list is radically different. As a person who tends towards oily skin, I find this formulation to be *far* superior to the normal Cetaphil product...it does what the package says: Cleans without overly drying my skin. I also like the scent more and it seems more concentrated, too.
customer_reviews.author: ILikeAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Leak and different scent
customer_reviews.text: One of the bottles had clearly already been opened. It was leaking and the texture and scent of the product is different from the Cetaphil I usually buy at the drugstore.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Fake
customer_reviews.text: I am so serious! I have sensitive skin! I can’t use it it doesn’t sell right! Fake cetaphil! Two bottles for one package,one for my friend. I was so regret.she doesn’t like it at all !
customer_reviews.author: Mandy chen

customer_reviews.title: Priced Right
customer_reviews.text: I usually go to my local pharmacy type store to get this. I found on Amazon it's cheaper and in a 2 pack. Can't go wrong. This facial soap is very soft and gentle for the most extremely sensitive faces. Like any soap it's going to dry your face if you leave it on for an extended period. I use the same brand face moisturizer. The two are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Jr

customer_reviews.title: Different product
customer_reviews.text: I am used to using a milky-white cleanser. This cleanser is glycerin-type lotion and it burns at little and has a strong odor. I've used Cetaphil before and I don't recall it being a glycerin-type cleanser. Have they changed the product? Unfortunately, I have to give a two-star rating.
customer_reviews.author: H M

customer_reviews.title: Good cleanser.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on accident, thinking it was the gentle skin cleanser, so i was surprised at the gel like texture and scent, but it had cleaned my skin well and has not caused any irritation. I have very sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa K.

customer_reviews.title: Not the Gentle Skin Cleanser I expected to receive
customer_reviews.text: This item came in the Cetaphil bottle but the product inside is not The Gentle skin cleanser I expected to get. It is Daily Facial Cleanser. I have used Cetaphil Gentle Skin Cleanser as a cleanser for years and this is not it. My skin is extremely sensitive and using this one time has caused extreme damage to my skin. They won’t allow me to return it so hopefully this will help someone from making the same mistake I did.
customer_reviews.author: WMD0926

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Prevents breakout. Have used it for over 10 years now. I instantly break out when I run out
customer_reviews.author: kukz

customer_reviews.title: JUST BECAUSE YALL CANT READ DOESN'T MEAN ITS BAD
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. Ive been using it about a week now along with some st. Ives facial moisturizer and feel like my skin looks so much more vibrant. The bottles are also HUGE and should last me quite a while. Has a very good scent, almost like baby lotion or baby powder. EDIT:I now have been using this for almost a month. Still great. Helps tame oily skin and still havent made a dent. You only need about 1 pump. Maybe one and a half. Has helped clear breakout and prevent more from coming.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!  THIS IS A FAKE/SCAM PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had read the reviews before purchasing. Lesson learned. I've used pharmacy bought Cetaphil for the past 3 years and love it. Whatever came in this bottle was NOT the real Cetaphil and immediately started to burn my eyes and face. I washed it off almost instantly but my skin is still red and irritated. Amazon should not let this seller sell through their website. DO NOT BUY, DO NOT BUY, DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney G

customer_reviews.title: Horrible! Hives & maybe chemical burns.
customer_reviews.text: Smells awful. I used this for a week and broke out in hives horribly. I thought it was from stress but then had the idea it’s the soap. Stopped using it and bam they were gone within 2 days. Absolutely ridiculous. This was suggested by my dermatologist. I don’t recommend this to anyone! Normally my skin isn’t “too sensitive” either just mildly sensitive. So I find it really strange that this broke me out like that. I felt like my face neck and ears were on fire!!!!! Almost like a chemical burn. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke123

customer_reviews.title: WILL DRY YOUR FACE OUT LIKE JERKY!
customer_reviews.text: SO HORRIBLY DRYING! After using for a few days in a row my face stings because it is so dry. I thought I was purchasing the gentle cleanser instead of this crap. It is also overly fragrant, that personally does not bother me but I know it does matter to many others. The drying of this product though, is unbearable. My face is now so dry that it has become really oilly to compensate. My face is both dry and oily now. THANKS, CETAPHIL
customer_reviews.author: April friske

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me
customer_reviews.text: I was recommended this product from a friend and I’ve been using it every night since I bought it. I usually have normal skin but lately I’ve been suffering from oily skin and this 100% helped. I recommend using a light amount because at least for me it does dry out my skin a little bit. The first time I used it was when my face felt the most dry but as I kept using it and use that little less every time the dryness went down.
customer_reviews.author: Rashely Matias

customer_reviews.title: The Hype is Valid!
customer_reviews.text: Both my boyfriend and I use this face wash now and it's been great! He has Eczema on multiple parts of his face and sensitive skin. It doesn't cause it to flare up or flake more. He also never experienced redness from it and he uses it every day. For me my skin as been fairly clear after years of struggling to find a good system. I only use a daily moisturizer with fps and rosewater on my face now aside from the cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: A thousand times better than Walmart or any store
customer_reviews.text: I am using it because I started to lose my hair so bought me some biotin gummies but this caused acne in my face and then the dermatologist recommended this face soap to get rid of the excessive grease the biotin and folic acid was causing. For the price I could buy 1 at Walmart or Target I bought 2 here. Love it, it is very delicate with my skin and it doesn't dry out my face at all, it is perfectly balanced
customer_reviews.author: Karla Canelo

customer_reviews.title: It's a lifesaver for dry flaky skin
customer_reviews.text: Before I used this soap, I was having occasional issues with my skin flaking on my face followed by redness. Mostly on my chin and around my nose. My friends told me that the major name brand soaps were to blame with all the chemicals. Ever since I started using Cetaphil, that all went away. Saved me from having to go to the dermatologist. I'll never go back to using any other soap!
customer_reviews.author: Frank B

customer_reviews.title: Strong perfume scent
customer_reviews.text: This has a terrible and strong perfumey scent. Returning it, it’s unbearable.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great cleanser
customer_reviews.text: This was recommended by my dermatologist years ago. I used it for a while and forgot about it. When I was planning to stay with a friend for a while and just needed the basics, this was the item I ordered to replaced some of my daily skincare cleansing items. Great for sensitive skin, gentle yes effective for a quick cleanse.
customer_reviews.author: BubblieTop Contributor: Aquascaping

customer_reviews.title: Fake!  Fake!  Fake!
customer_reviews.text: This in no way a Cetaphil product. It smells like baby shampoo and left my skin very dry and tight. Do not buy this. This seller is dishonest with the product sold. Reported to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: mamie

customer_reviews.title: Great gentle cleanser and affordable!
customer_reviews.text: This is the actual facial cleaner that suds. The body one is more like a moisturizer that cleanses with no soapy feeling. I have really sensitive skin but get occasional oiliness and breakouts and this is the best cleanser for me. The Rodan & Fields cleansing mask I was using before was expensive and made my skin red and dry in spots.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui01

customer_reviews.title: Great skin care product I have found for my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and this is my favorite cleanser. I have used Cetaphil for years. The value is great and my skin is healthy and thoroughly cleansed. I highly recommend this product that was suggested by my dermatologist years ago. Best advice I’ve had and will continue to use this product to take care of my flawless looking skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My go to facial cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I love this cleanser. I am a male in my mid-20s, and I have extremely sensitive skin. I still struggle with acne, pimples, and dry skin. This cleanser cleared up my skin better than any product I've ever tried. For years I've tried many different face product/toners/cleansers. This cleanser exceeded my expectations, especially since it's not "gimmicky" like its counterparts on the market. I bought the two-pack months ago, and I haven't finished the first bottle. If you need a face cleanser, I recommend starting with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Andres M

customer_reviews.title: Fake refilled do not buy not original cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this in June so when mine ran out I had them. I just went to use it and it reeks and is not the original cleaner that should be in there. I immediately re washed my face with something else. I will be throwing these away. DON'T BUY! Get it at a local store.
customer_reviews.author: Pats

customer_reviews.title: Works for my skin!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only facial cleanser my daughter and I use. We both have skin that will dry out if harsh products are used. This Cetaphil brand hasn’t given me any issues for years. My face definitely feels clean after I use it and the scent isn’t overpowering. Definitely recommend trying it out if you have sensitive skin or just want to use something more gentle on your face!
customer_reviews.author: ~Fabulousness~

customer_reviews.title: Loyal User for 10+ Years
customer_reviews.text: I swear by Cetaphil! I don't find much of a difference between the brand name and generic brands but buy it out of loyalty. It's amazing! I've used it for 10+ years and have tried other face washes but none of them compare to Cetaphil. I never get acne, or dry skin, I do have some oily patches, but Cetaphil fixes that right up!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for a good face wash, this one is perfect! It’s probably more expensive than others , but you get what you pay for, leaves my skin feeling soft and clean! This brand is Dermatology approved, and I’ve bought the lotion in the past, and I am sticking to the same product. I bought two, glad I did
customer_reviews.author: Lorena Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Check the ingredients! Not the same as Gentle Skin Cleanser!
customer_reviews.text: This product is described as "perfect for sensitive skin", however, there is an ingredient called "masking fragrances" aka "parfum" which is very ambiguous. Before this cleanser could even give you an allergic reaction, you will turn away from the strong perfume smell. If you decide to try it, the consistency is clear and thick and foams up - very different from the "Gentle Skin Cleanser" formula which is creamy, light, does not foam and does not irritate. This is not a returnable product so make sure it is the formulation you need!
customer_reviews.author: Jess N

customer_reviews.title: Clear skin in no time
customer_reviews.text: I've recently started breaking out and had some dark spots and acne scars, I decided to try this just to see how my skin reacts....1 week in and I am shocked... my skin is so much clearer and the dark spots are fading. Mine came nicely packaged, no spillage or broken pump. I have enough to last me a while but I'll definitely be ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Mellissa

customer_reviews.title: Gentile on skin
customer_reviews.text: I have been experiencing some breakouts on my face which I rarely have so I needed to change up my facial regimen. I started using this face wash and after a week my face cleared up and felt so much better. I do have sensitive skin so this was perfect I had no reaction to it after using. Would recommend to someone that is looking for a gentile facial cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Belt

customer_reviews.title: Made things worse
customer_reviews.text: I at first go a pack of two of these, huge mistake and no idea what I was thinking. I started using this to help with my skin obviously, and it just made things worse. And as things got worse I thought it a great idea to use more and oh boy was I wrong about halfway through the bottle I realized this thing was hardly helping after first putting on your skin feels refreshed and relived but you'll notice you have more acne than before (over time). This product is of no help.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Soft and doesn't feel very exciting, and it smells good.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very fast, placed the order the day before, and arrived the next day. After receiving it, I tried it immediately. It's soft and doesn't feel very exciting, and it smells easier for me to accept. The only thing that is not easy to use is because it sticks to the hair easily, and it takes a long time to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Xuefeng Li

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin. This is a wonderful facial solution to clean my pores and remove daily grime. I’ve even used it as body soap for many years. My dermatologist recommended it to me more than a decade ago. There is no scent in this product and although it doesn’t dry my complexion I topped my cleansed face off with a facial moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Deane A. Voss

customer_reviews.title: Best face wash
customer_reviews.text: My favorite face wash, very gentle and effective in washing. Doesn’t clog my pores or irritate my skin.
customer_reviews.author: J Beal

customer_reviews.title: Good product but too strong of a scent...
customer_reviews.text: The scent is very strong, it does the job but it dries my skin out a bit. May switch to just once a day instead of twice. I use a toner and moisturizer after and it all works well together. The biggest thing is that I'm not a fan of the scent, too strong. My nose is very sensitive though.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Bait and switch
customer_reviews.text: The solution seems borderline fraudulent. Very similar packaging to the gental face AND skin cleanser. But the actual solution is horribly chemically.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: FAKE. Caused a huge breakout
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying this is not what my face normally looks like. The most acne I ever get is like a bump here & there on my chin or the crease of my nose. My face started breaking out shortly after using this wash. & the places my skin looks clear, feels rough. I’m highly aggravated that I can’t get it to clear back up after using this wash. I threw the product in the garbage. Do not waste your money, time, or energy on this stuff. I promise you’ll regret it. It seems like most reviews are pretty negative on it now after I bought it. FAKE FAKE FAKE FAKE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dyl&kay

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good price
customer_reviews.text: After trying different products for sensitive skins, we returned to this since it simply works well for all skin types in the family. It doesn’t foam like others, but once we got used to it, it’s not an issue anymore. It’s also reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: Great product for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well on my very sensitive dry face. Just be sure to follow up with your usual skin care cream products
customer_reviews.author: William of Florida

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used this brand of cleanser was because the reviews were good. However, after the actual use, I found that it did not like the smell, the effect of cleaning the face is not good, I feel not clean, not as good as the brand I used before, will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: K. Hu

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Product is great! Smells fine to me. Also, I feel like it has cleared my skin. I regularly wax/shave my face because of my peach fuzz. After doing so, I wash my face with this and I get zero breakouts unlike other cleansers.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie O

customer_reviews.title: Unscented
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for about a year. It was recommended by my dermatologist for anyone with rosacea. It is gentle and calms the redness. It is also unscented which is really nice as I am allergic to scented products. Will keep buying and using!
customer_reviews.author: anne

customer_reviews.title: Best facial cleanser.
customer_reviews.text: If you have a face, you should be using this cleanser. It's not irritating, suds up the way you want it to, and just slippery enough to be great for facial exfoliation pads. I'll never use a different cleanser.
customer_reviews.author: BlueEyesMN

customer_reviews.title: Doctor recommended & proven effective
customer_reviews.text: My dermatologist prescribed this product as a part of my skin care regimen; in lieu of soap products to cleanse my face without causing dryness or irritation - I have used it for many years now without any negative affects. Cetaphil Daily Facial Cleanser is tried and true.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Value pack
customer_reviews.text: This product is actually great, but my skin is a bit dry so it made my skin itchy, and I need to put moisturizer every time I wash my face. If you guys have dry skin might consider something else, but if you have normal skin definitely need to try this. Very cheap comparing to cleanser from sephora. I’m sephora’s lover but I totally recommend this than the fresh.. Very soft and gentle to the skin, the scent is not so strong(which I really like).
customer_reviews.author: Nadya Carella

customer_reviews.title: Not Fragrance Free
customer_reviews.text: Beware - this is a lot different from the fragrance free face wash. I made the mistake of buying this and my eyes swelled up, and I can't return. If your face is sensitive, get the fragrance free one.
customer_reviews.author: BAM

customer_reviews.title: Great for oily skin and good deal
customer_reviews.text: Only face wash my family uses and definitely works for oily skin!
customer_reviews.author: MCHAOCHAO

customer_reviews.title: Harsh face wash!
customer_reviews.text: This product was very harsh on my skin which resulted in a burning sensation and tiny bumps forming on my cheeks. I have never experienced any kind of reaction to any facial cleansers or body wash. I wish I could return this product. It was a complete waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Yoshe

customer_reviews.title: Not the right kind
customer_reviews.text: This is the clear kind not the white color like in the store, very disappointed. The clear doesn’t absorb oil the way the white lotiony kind does (I️ use this as step one of a facial routine) won’t purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Chell Candie

customer_reviews.title: Cleans without drying
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for years. The original cleanser (the one not for normal to oily) was suggested to me by my dermatologist and while I think it is probably great, it didn't leave my skin feeling clean, more like I had applied lotion. This gives me that clean feeling without stripping it but without all the extra moisturizing.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: NO HARSH CHEMICALS
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE this product & all their products!! You have to try!! They make it for babies (Baby wash) hands, adults wash products!! If you have sensitive skin this is a must!!!! Thank you Cetaphil!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Julsann1

customer_reviews.title: Love the 2 pack!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cleanser for my 40 year old face. Sometimes it can be a little drying, but I always moisturize. The 2 pack is great so you can have one in the shower and one by the sink. The price is better than my local Walmart and it’s so much more convenient to have it delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Lomond

customer_reviews.title: Very heavily scented ☹️
customer_reviews.text: Strong scent so i just leave it for the rest of my family to use in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Reine

customer_reviews.title: Good for acne-prone, combination, and sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Good product, beware of fake products though as the consistency seemed a little different to me than what I previously bought in stores. However, I called the manufacturer and confirmed it was the original product. No scent on lotion makes it great for those with sensitive skin (works well for acne-prone and combination skin too)
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: An item not for every one. But good for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: Even though I gave this item three stars I would purchase this again. The thing I dont like is this item is thick. Whenusing on your face use a dime size and put under water and lather. To me this item is not moisturizing but my face feels clean after I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Fran Brown

customer_reviews.title: I was slightly disappointed by what I saw when I first used it
customer_reviews.text: The overall facial cleanser feels rather oily when applied and isn't of the same quality of other Cetaphil products. I was slightly disappointed by what I saw when I first used it, and it doesn't really have any major difference in skin quality when I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Wu

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I always purchase it from Walmart but, due to the virus I tried to avoid stores and long lines and purchase it on Amazon. That’s the best product for all types of skin or if you have pimples.
customer_reviews.author: Didi

customer_reviews.title: Not the rea
customer_reviews.text: This product does not feel Like the cleanser I have grown to love. . Been using Cetaphil for 10 years and it’s the first time it smelt so horribly strong and very drying on my skin. They don’t accept returns either on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best price for Cetaphil!
customer_reviews.text: I am soooo happy that this bundle is available! Going to the store, you're paying atleast $6 for an 8 oz bottle! set up the subscribe and save to earn even more discounts!
customer_reviews.author: Sheila M!

customer_reviews.title: Great hydration for Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: We love this lotion. It hydrated well and is great for dry/sensitive skin. The two pack is a great deal as it’s roughly the same price as a Single bottle at my local big box store.
customer_reviews.author: Jack R.

customer_reviews.title: I have heard so many great things about this product
customer_reviews.text: I have heard so many great things about this product, I was really looking forward to using it. But frankly, the fragrance is so strong, I just can't take it. It doesn't affect my skin, but it definitely overpowers my sinus. Such a bummer....
customer_reviews.author: Fingerdoo

customer_reviews.title: Tried and true.
customer_reviews.text: I had to get new face wash due my hair coloring and lash extensions. This face wash is so refreshing and delicate enough to not turn my blonde hair orange and it has helped keep my skin more clear and moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: The only product that seems to help clear my face up. I’ve been using this product for about a year, and bought this two pack for my brother in high school. It has cleared up his acne, boosting his confidence
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Williams

customer_reviews.title: I stopped using this brand, too many chemicals!
customer_reviews.text: I used to Cetaphil as a face soap but stopped because the chemicals , Sodium laureth sulfate (SLES), sodium lauryl ether sulfate were making my face burn and itch! I went with natural ingredients and have no problem!
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: It’s a NO
customer_reviews.text: Honestly,I don’t know why this product has a high review.It never cleans my face deeply,I always feel that I have to do it again and my face is still dirty I wouldn’t buy it again at all!! It’s a very very light face wash,like if you wanna wash your face in the morning! But that’s it
customer_reviews.author: Narges Javadi

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Daughter has sensitive skin. This is what works for her! We love it, it helps her confidence. Cheaper to buy this way, if you can.
customer_reviews.author: jbangledorf

customer_reviews.title: Not kind on sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: This product is not kind on sensitive skin. It does the job of cleaning but it burns and dries skin, specially if you have sensitive skin. Could only use it a few times before I could no longer take the sting and dryness on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Ptrock

customer_reviews.title: Very strong laundry detergent odor! Fake!!??
customer_reviews.text: It smells like raw laundry detergent and is nothing like the Cetaphil facial soap/cleanser I've used before. Really disgusting! Is this a fake?
customer_reviews.author: Yevgeniy

customer_reviews.title: FAKE product
customer_reviews.text: This product was fake and burned my eyes and skin and had a cheap flower smell. Whoever supplied this should be BANNED from Amazon. My face is still stinging.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT Cetaphil Gentle Skin Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I cannot count the times I have ordered this by mistake. The packaging appears almost exactly the same as the gentle skin cleanser. The facial cleanser has a disagreeable fragrance and more importantly irritates my eczema-prone skin. And there is a no return policy for this product. Frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Moss

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product! I have extremely sensitive skin and this product is perfect for that. I was a little skeptical because of the strong perfumes, but I haven't had any issues with it. I also love the large container it comes in!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Addicted To The Smell
customer_reviews.text: I never heard of this stuff until my dermatologist told me to use it after a procedure. I am addicted to the smell. I would give it 5 stars if it had any inkling of lather, but there is absolutely no lather whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: The Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry skin!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time using this face wash. My face is pretty dry, but I have noticed a difference with this. It also has a nice, light scent
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Grisham

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I used to use this product all the time in high school and was excited to use it. It dried my skin out sooo badly. I only used it for less than a week too. Especially around my eyes it burned and my skin was dry and leathery. Putting moisturizer on top made it so much worse that I had to wash off the moisturizer.. really disappointed I thought it would be perfect for me.. don’t waster your money I hope my skin goes back to normal
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

product_meta.title: Cetaphil Facial Cleanser, Daily Face Wash for Normal to Oily Skin, 16Oz (Pack of 2)
product_meta.description: Size:16 Ounce (Pack of 2)| Style:Daily Facial CleanserSimplify the way you care for your skin with Cetaphil Daily Facial Cleanser. Leaving skin feeling soft, clean and healthy, Cetaphil Daily Facial Cleanser is effective, yet gentle at removing surface oils, dirt and makeup. The non-stripping and non-irritating formula rinses clean without leaving pore-clogging residue behind and will never leave skin feeling dry or tight. The low-lathering formula is dermatologist recommended and can be used daily in the morning and at night.
feature_bullets: Clinically proven to deep clean skin: cleanses without leaving skin feeling dry
Skin feels refreshed & moisturized: low lather formula will not strip skin of essential oils, which can leave skin feeling dry and tight
Removes oils & dirt: Hypoallergenic facial cleanser is gentle enough for morning and night use and is clinically proven to deep clean skin and remove oils, dirt and makeup
PERFECT FOR SENSITIVE SKIN: Dermatologist recommended and non comedogenic skin cleanser rinses clean without leaving pore clogging residue; Massage a small amount onto wet skin. Aluminum free
Gentle enough for everyday use; mild and non irritating formula is perfect for normal to oily skin and is suitable for even the most sensitive skin

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
